title: A California Gold Rush town was like ‘going back in time’. Then came a wildfire
summary: A historic 19th-century settlement, originally established by Chinese miners and known for its association with the outlaw Black Bart, was recently ravaged by a fire. The blaze caused significant destruction to the community's remnants. Efforts to assess the damage and recover from the incident are underway.

title: Australia news live: Albanese holds ‘constructive’ phone call with Trump; two die on road trying to save animal
summary: It seems like you may have wanted to provide a specific news article or details for summarization. Please share the content you'd like summarized, and I'll be happy to assist!

title: President of Northwestern University quits amid layoffs forced by Trump cuts
summary: Michael H. Schill, who served as the president of the institution for three years, faced significant budget challenges as the Trump administration cut nearly $800 million in funding. His leadership coincided with these financial pressures, impacting the institution's operations. The announcement highlights the challenges faced by educational leaders during politically turbulent times.

title: Fired health official offers to testify under oath after RFK Jr accused her of lying in heated Senate hearing – live
summary: The former CDC director, who faced accusations of dishonesty from Robert F. Kennedy Jr., has stated her willingness to testify regarding the pressure she received to approve a panel that included individuals with anti-vaccine perspectives. She aims to clarify the circumstances surrounding the decision. The situation highlights ongoing tensions between public health officials and vaccine skeptics.

title: Trump set to host US tech leaders at Rose Garden – minus Elon Musk
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's absence from the White House highlights a significant shift from his frequent presence during the early days of the Trump administration. This change underscores a potential shift in priorities and engagement with the current government. Musk's relationship with the administration appears to have cooled compared to previous interactions.
